Pulling and processing OWID Testing Data

Source: R/get_testing.R
get_find_testing_long.Rd

Pulling and processing OWID Testing Data

Usage

get_find_testing_long(find_maxgap = 31, flag_test_increase = 5)

Arguments

find_maxgap

(numeric, default: 31) Gap between cumulative testing number to linearly interpolate

flag_test_increase

(numeric, default: 5) Flag for increase in interpolated cumulative tests

On this page
